feed.title: IIIF Manifests by C. Pitta - Exhibition of 19th c prints by W. Daniell RA
feed.subtitle: As part of my Masters Thesis in Information Sciences (NOVA), this website has the goal to showcase the possibilities of IIIF Manifests to a small exhibition of 19th centuries prints.

entry.title: My Masters thesis
entry.content: My masters research is on the International Image Interoperability Framework in the context of the cultural heritage institutions and universities.
entry.summary: My masters research is on the International Image Interoperability Framework in the context of the cultural heritage institutions and universities.
